attributes.action: Abandon the contact point Database scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ContactPoint will hold data of every under 18 in Britain.  In the current climate where Data loss/theft is a constant news story - the new database scheme is destined to leak regulary, no matter how secure it is made.  No parent wants their child information leaked for a second time, following the failures at HMRC
